params._applicationIds: Indexes of the applications to accept.

params._execute: If the request should also be executed in this transaction.
params._requestType: What kind of request it is.

params._reward: Wanted rewards for completing the task.

params._explanation: Why the task was cancelled. (IPFS hash)

params._budget: Maximum ERC20 rewards that can be earned by completing the task.
params._deadline: Block timestamp at which the task expires if not completed.
params._manager: Who will manage the task (become the manager).

returns.taskId: Id of the newly created task.

editMetadata(uint256,string).details: This metadata update might change the task completely. Show a warning to people who applied before the change.

params._requestType: What kind of request it is.

params._extension: How much to extend the deadline by.

params._executor: The executor to fetch tasks of.
params._fromTaskId: What taskId to start from. 0 for most recent task.
params._max: The maximum amount of tasks to return. 0 for no max.

params._fromTaskId: What taskId to start from. 0 for most recent task.
params._manager: The manager to fetch tasks of.
params._max: The maximum amount of tasks to return. 0 for no max.

params._increase: How much to increase each tokens amount by.

params._submissionId: Index of the submission that is reviewed.

params._applicationId: Index of application you made that has been accepted.

acceptApplications(uint256,uint16[]).notice: Accept application to allow them to take the task.

acceptRequest(uint256,uint8,uint8,bool).notice: Accepts a request, executing the proposed action.

cancelTask(uint256,string).notice: Cancels a task. This can be used to close a task and receive back the budget.

editMetadata(uint256,string).notice: Edit the metadata of a task.

executeRequest(uint256,uint8,uint8).notice: Exectued an accepted request, allows anyone to pay for the gas costs of the execution.

extendDeadline(uint256,uint64).notice: Extend the deadline of a task.

getExecutingTasks(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Retrieves all tasks of an executor. Most recent ones first.

getManagingTasks(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Retrieves all tasks of a manager. Most recent ones first.

getTask(uint256).notice: Retrieves all task information by id.

increaseBudget(uint256,uint96[]).notice: Increase the budget of the task.

takeTask(uint256,uint16).notice: Take the task after your application has been accepted.

taskCount().notice: Retrieves the current amount of created tasks.

taskStatistics().notice: Retrieves the current statistics of created tasks.
